data.question: Which of the following correctly represents biomagnification?
data.op_1: Producers accumulate the highest pesticide concentration
data.op_2: Top carnivores accumulate the highest pesticide concentration
data.op_3: Decomposers accumulate the highest pesticide concentration
data.op_4: Primary consumers accumulate the highest pesticide concentration
data.ans: Top carnivores accumulate the highest pesticide concentration

data.question: Which of the following practices helps in reducing environmental pollution?
data.op_2: Segregation of biodegradable and non-biodegradable waste
data.ans: Segregation of biodegradable and non-biodegradable waste

data.question: Which one of the following is responsible for acid rain?
What is the role of decomposers in an ecosystem?
data.op_2: Recycle nutrients back to the soil
data.op_3: Transfer energy to higher trophic levels
data.ans: Recycle nutrients back to the soil

data.question: Which of the following contributes maximum to global warming?
Which of the following is not a consequence of deforestation?
Which of the following causes algal bloom in water bodies?
Which one of the following organisms is likely to have the maximum concentration of pesticides?
Which of the following explains the importance of energy flow in an ecosystem?
data.op_2: Energy decreases at each trophic level
data.op_3: Energy increases at each trophic level
data.ans: Energy decreases at each trophic level

data.question: Which practice is most effective in managing plastic waste?

Which of the following practices reduces eutrophication?
In a food web, the energy transfer is:
Which of the following is an effect of ozone layer depletion?
